categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Lindy was an old friend of Derek Klivian who assisted Klivian and Biggs Darklighter in defecting to the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War.

Prior to 0 BBY, Lindy became friends with Derek Klivian. Lindy had contacts in the Rebel Alliance, and let Klivian, a Rebel sympathizer, know. On graduating from Prefsbelt IV naval academy, Klivian decided to defect to the Rebel Alliance, taking with him Rand Ecliptic, the ship on which he served. To that end, he contacted Lindy on Bestine IV. Lindy was able to put him in contact with Alliance agents and facilitated the Rand Ecliptic's escape, under the control of Klivian and Biggs Darklighter, to the Rebel Alliance.
